Name: Creator
Description: This field is used to record the creator of the documented physical object.

Name: Creator Role
Description: This field is used to record the role played by the creator in the production of the documented physical object.

Name: Current Owner
Description: This field is used to record the present owner of the documented physical object.

Name: Current Holder
Description: This field is used to indicate the current holder of the documented physical object.

Name: Creator Attributed By
Description: This field is used to indicate the actor who attributed the creator to the documented object.

Name: Attribution Date Earliest
Description: This field is used to record the earliest possible date for the attribution of the creator to the documented object.

Name: Attribution Date Latest
Description: This field is used to record the latest possible date for the attribution of the creator to the documented object.

Name: Creator Attribution Source
Description: This field is used to indicate the source work used in the attribution of the creator to the documented object.
